ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Thanks and more questions...Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: Being a half elf bard, typically, the ones i know tend to be battle bards, and therefore go the tank route.  But if you re like me, and not necessarily looking
ygData.messageBody:
Being a half elf bard, typically, the ones i know tend to be battle bards,
and therefore go the tank route. But if you're like me, and not necessarily
looking for every single strength item in the game, I would recommend a
White Gold Necklace (Froglok Noble in LGuk) instead of the +6str the Runed
Lava Pendant offers. The neck to which i refer is no ac (yukky) but has 7
cha and +7 f/c/mag... handy on every type of Also an opinion, and it's what
i've seen on like 1 other bard on the entire server, which happens to, or
used to, post here.

Thanks Flew!

Pava Rahti
49 Bard
Cazic Thule
